Articles.Content:
In the VAB, randomly I won't be able to click parts, and when I hover over parts in the sidebar, they just turn lighter blue, as normal, but they don't enlarge or spin, and I won't be able to click on parts I already have out, so I can't use the VAB, I go out of it and back in, same thing.

Edited September 3, 2015 by Sharkman Briton
Logs? Modlist? We can't help you without them.
Will do in a minute, I've remembered it started happening after I installed TAC Fuel Balancer, just seeing if it's fine without it.
